# Dependencies Preparation Instructions

Please place the following files in this folder (`c:\Users\jhjy5\Documents\GitHub\AllbenKitchenManager\dependencies\`) before running the Inno Setup compiler:

1. **vc_redist.x64.exe**
   - Official Download: [aka.ms/vc14/vc_redist.x64.exe](https://aka.ms/vc14/vc_redist.x64.exe)
   - Purpose: Essential C++ runtime for Flutter/Windows applications.

2. **Wireshark (TShark)**
   - Official Download: [wireshark.org/download.html](https://www.wireshark.org/download.html)
   - Purpose: `pyshark` library requires TShark to parse the MySQL packets captured by Npcap.

After placing these files (if you choose to bundle them) or ensuring they are installed, follow the guide.
Note: The installer will check for existing installations and provide links if missing.
